EmailTemplate.name: CR 9 Invitation to apply for SA role
EmailTemplate.subject: Want a permanent role with The Challenge? More roles available.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
More roles available - Work for The Challenge full time!
We hope you have enjoyed your summer with us at NCS with The Challenge.
We are currently recruiting for a variety of new roles to work in our two London, Birmingham and Manchester Offices.
You may in particular be interested in our Staffing Associate, Staffing Projects Associate and Staffing Associate Manager roles, There are multiple places that need to be filled.
You can find all opportunities and role descriptions at http://www.the-challenge.org/year-round-roles .
Don't miss out, apply now!
Best Wishes,
NCS with The Challenge
Follow us on Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn
